trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the value and location of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> cell for use when copying content to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 클립보드에 내용을 복사할 때 사용할 수 있도록 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 셀의 값과 위치를 캡슐화합니다.

trans-unit.source: This structure is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
The data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 복사 중인 셀 내용이 들어 있는 행의 데이터 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
The text value of the cell being copied.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> structure.
Gets the column that contains the cell being copied.
The column that contains the cell being copied.
Gets the text value of the cell being copied.
The text value of the cell being copied.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance.
Indicates whether the current and specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스와 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 인스턴스가 같은지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current and specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> property values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스와 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 인스턴스의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> 속성 값이 동일하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance.
The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance.

The hash code is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 해시 코드는 기반는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 복사 중인 셀 내용이 들어 있는 행의 데이터 항목을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 복사 중인 셀 내용이 들어 있는 행의 데이터 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances are equivalent.

<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> property values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 인스턴스의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> 속성 값이 동일하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances are not equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 인스턴스가 같지 않은지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current and specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances do not have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> property values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스와 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 인스턴스의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> 속성 값이 동일하지 않으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.
